title: Learn the Basics of Web Development
description: Start with HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript. Understand how the web works, DOM manipulation, and responsive design.

title: Frontend Frameworks
description: Master a modern frontend framework. React is the industry standard, but Vue or Angular are also options. Learn about state management and API integration.

title: Backend Development
description: Learn server-side programming. Node.js is a great choice for JavaScript developers. Understand databases (SQL and NoSQL), authentication, and API design.

title: Full Stack Integration & DevOps Basics
description: Connect frontend and backend. Learn about deployment, CI/CD pipelines, and basic cloud services (AWS/Firebase). Build full-stack projects.

title: Senior Full Stack Dev / Tech Lead
description: Master system architecture, scalability, and lead teams. contributions to open source or complex enterprise projects.
